00013 {
00014     behaviors[PASSIVE]= new AmbushPredator();
00015     behaviors[STALKING] = behaviors[PASSIVE];
00016     behaviors[PURSUING] = new AggressivePredator();
00017     behaviors[CAUTIOUS] = behaviors[PASSIVE];
00018     behaviors[FLEEING] = new FleeingPredator;

00025     delete behaviors[FLEEING];
